montana max baucus selling out to radical gun controlby montana news si police superintendent rogelio labor , hepe sa villanueva police station , niila sa biktima nga si jeren perez , hingkod ang edad , minyo , residente sa claveria , ug nagtrabaho sa usa ka local government unit ( lgu ) sa susamang lungsod .
gisaysay ni labor nga mga alas 2 : 00 sa hapon dunay nanawag kanila nga adunay nahugno nga yuta sa dapit mao nga ilang girespondehan .
paghidangat sa quarry area , nasuta sa kapulisan nga ang maong quarry gihimo sa lgu aron mobakbak og yuta sa dapit gamit ang backhoe nga gi-operate ni mark anthony lusterio , nagpuyo sa susamang dapit .
si lusterio namahayag nga sa iyang pagbakbak , giingong kalit lang nahugno ang nagbukid nga yuta ug samtang nagpalandong sa likod nga bahin si perez ug nahugnoan kini ug natabunan .
tungod kay daw nalubong naman si perez gikalot na sab kini sa backhoe .
giingon sa mga residente nga daw nakapatay ug samot sa biktima ang backhoe human naigo sa likod niini .
matud sab ni labor nga adunay posibilidad nga sa pagrescue niini , nasamad kini sa backhoe o ang ulo niini posibleng natagakan sa bato .
dili kumbinsido ang pamilya , labina ang amahan niini , sa pagkakita nila sa patayng lawas ni perez tungod kay daw ang samad niini sa likod nga bahin napikas ug daw agi sa tinigbasan .
naabhak sab ang ulo niini .
gisuwayan pa og dala si perez sa duol nga balay tambalanan apan dead on arrival kining gideklarar sa doctor .
gipapriso sab sa amahan niini ang backhoe operator ug gikatakdang pasakaan og kasong reckless imprudence resulting to homicide .
buot sab sa pamilya nga masuta gyod kung ang gikamatyan ba gyod niini ang pagkatabunan sa yuta o gitigbas kini tungod sa mga samad nga naangkon .
sa pagsulat ning balita anaa na gidala sa punerarya ang patayng lawas samtang gihulat na usab nila ang resulta sa otopsiya nga gihimo huwebes sa hapon .
" as i 've said , the series is not yet over and i am happy that we are able to tie it ( 2-2 ) , " said a jubilant uv head coach felix " donbel " belano , jr .
" we fought until the end and as if there 's no tomorrow .
it 's the heart , defense and above all our faith in god that carried us to the crucial win . "
again , the two sides figured in a heart-stopping duel , but the lancers proved to be the hungrier and more determined squad in the end .
the best the cobras could muster was at 66-69 with 50 seconds to go as a horrible free-throw shooting scuttled their hopes of turning the tables on the gallant lancers .
the cobras fumbled their last chance to pull a great escape after mark jayven tallo , who limped out of the court twice due to leg cramps , committed a costly error on an inbound pass that was intercepted by abad .
it was a sorry ending for what had been a spectacular game by tallo , who practically carried swu on his shoulders on the way to a season-best 28 points .

however the ruling is not clear but costs change due to this so use our prices only as a general guideline.bangkok costs are a lot higher than chiangmai.you can have 1m baht company but no and only available for us residents setting up in thailand or go to the section on amity treaty but before you think of starting one you must have an existing lawyers in bangkok , pattaya , korat , phuket and use a corporate law office in bangkok .
if house report = 6000 baht for an old house ( over 2 years ) & 3000 baht for a the security as a company .
once formed the remaining fees are the same as a company .
our fee is 14,000 baht which includes govt fees and id tax code work .
we now offer " o " visa services .
for new companies the new law requires a work permit to obtain a b visa from penang or another country .
if you do not meet the required residency visas . visas to the usa , uk etc we cannot help nor once you are in business for 12 months and you have we do charge travel & expenses if we have to fly to the main centres but we do keep these to a minimum as a lot of our work we do use other law offices .
these may vary but please do not hesitate to ask us. consultations will incur a 1000 baht feebut some lawyers charge 2500baht to 10,000 baht per copurt hearing on top opf your orginal deposit fee at the start .

editoryal : ang hukom ni judge dumdum nalzaro : kampanya batok sa ilegal nga sugal at the center of it all was the very rev. frank j. caggiano , the diocese of bridgeport 's humble and charismatic new leader .
then he asked his audience to reflect on the " transformative power of spiritual bridges , " saying , " our mission has much to do with building ( them ) .
god has reached out to us to build a spiritual bridge uniting us to him , uniting us each day to grow deeper into his heart and be transformed . "
then caggiano told a story of how bridgeport and brooklyn are linked .
" six days after the completion of the brooklyn bridge , a vicious rumor emerged .
can you imagine ?
the rumor was that the bridge was about to collapse .
the rumor caused a panic and some on the bridge were trampled to death , " caggiano said .
that was the second time that caggiano delighted his audience and proved , " i did my homework . "
up in the choir loft , which was standing-room only , a teenager nodded his head and smiled .
he elbowed a girl next to him , and said , " this guy is good .
very good . "
this time , it ’ s rene ’ s turn to absorb mayor lim ’ s ire featuring solon ’ s tarpaulins foto : tasrbratislava 22. novembra 2012 ( tasr ) - spravodajský portál tlačovej agentúry slovenskej republiky ( tasr ) teraz.sk dnes sprístupnil aj mobilnú verziu svojej stránky .
na adrese m.teraz.sk si návštevníci portálu môžu prečítať najaktuálnejšie spravodajstvo zo servisu tasr priamo vo svojich mobilných telefónoch či tabletoch . „ v lete sme priniesli našim čitateľom mobilné aplikácie pre systémy android a ios , neskôr aj špeciálnu aplikáciu pre tablety .
teraz sme vyšli v ústrety všetkým majiteľom mobilných zariadení , ktorí z akéhokoľvek dôvodu nemôžu využívať naše aplikácie , “ povedal generálny riaditeľ tasr jaroslav rezník .
mobilná verzia spravodajského portálu teraz.sk je dostupná na adrese m.teraz.sk.
návštevníci prichádzajúci z akéhokoľvek mobilného zariadenia budú na ňu presmerovaní automaticky , v prípade , že chcú využívať plnú verziu stránky , ktorá je dátovo podstatne náročnejšia , dostanú sa na ňu jedným klikom .
portál teraz.sk sa počas deviatich mesiacov etabloval na slovenskom spravodajskom internetovom trhu .
mesačne ho číta viac približne štvrť milióna unikátnych návštevníkov a ďalších 30 000 ľudí má stiahnutú a využíva jednu z mobilných aplikácií .
tlačová agentúra slovenskej republiky ( tasr ) je lídrom na slovenskom agentúrnom trhu .
mesačne odvysiela cca 14 000 textových správ , viac ako 1200 zvukov , 600 videí a desaťtisíce fotografií .
okrem toho je prevádzkovateľom spravodajského portálu teraz.sk a webmagazin.sk.

surely if i can handle my seven kids and run a business publication , i could squeeze in a few hours a day for basketball practice .
and three or four hours per day for classes .
oh yeah , and a couple of hours per evening for studying .
hmmm .
so , if you are reading , coach dan , add me to the list for tryouts this summer .
and ask the trainer to load up on cortisone and advil .
in those days , i wrote virtually all of the advertising copy , and we were going to press on monday , so i needed to drive out to canmore immediately to conduct the interview .
as i worked out the details of a friday evening interview , it suddenly hit me that nicholas would be devastated if i cancelled our trip to the mountains .
i told garry that one angle for the ad feature was to have me bring my son to stay at the lodge and write a first-person piece on the experience .
garry thought it was a great idea and invited nick and me to have dinner with him and his colleague peter .
on the one-hour drive to canmore , i counselled nick on the importance of being polite and respectful while we ate dinner and while i did the interview .
windtower became one of my best clients in the years to follow , and i think our initial meeting with nick along for the ride was a big factor in creating a great client relationship .
angela behaved like an angel and clearly helped me win over a new client that would also go on to be a regular advertiser .
as we approached the green , one of our group suggested we just pick up our balls and head to the next tee .
great idea , i thought , particularly since my tee shot on the par 3 had fallen short of the green and a par was unlikely .

fuara , 1.2 milyon değerinde ki taş damgasını vurdu.i̇stanbul - türkiye açısından büyük önem taşıyan kuyum sektörünün nabzını tutan , “ istanbul jewellry show ekim 2013 ” yerli-yabancı firma ve tasarımcıları 37 ’ nci kez i̇stanbul ’ da buluşturdu .
4 gün boyunca sürecek olan fuarda , ünlü markalar en yeni modellerini ilk kez bugün gözler önüne çıkarttı .
birbirinden değerli taşların göz kamaştırdığı , paha biçilmesi çok zor olan ürünlerin büyüleyici atmosferi başları döndürdü.milyon dolarlık kıyafeti̇lk kez bu fuarda sergilenen , toplamda 12 kilo gram altından oluşan yelek , etek , kemer , ayakkabı ve taç görenleri şaşkına çevirdi .
altından oluşan kombinasyon özellikle fuarı ziyarete gelen arap alıcıların büyük ilgisini çekti .
fuarda yaşanan bir diğer sürpriz ise , dünya üzerinde sadece bin adet bulunan 50 karatlık taş oldu .
yaklaşık değeri 1.2 milyon doları bulan taşı kimin alacağı ise merak konusu oldu .
henüz takı haline getirilmeyen taş alıcısından sonra küpe , yüzük ya da eşsiz bir kolyeye dönüştürülecek.500 milyon dolar ihrac edileceki̇stanbul fuar merkezi ( cnr expo ) ’ da önemli ticari işbirliklerine imza atılacağı fuarın açılışını ; mücevher i̇hracatçılar birliği başkanı ayhan güner , ubm rotaforte murahhas aza ve genel müdür şermin cengiz birlikte gerçekleştirdi .
türkiye ’ nin en önemli ihtisas fuarları arasında yer alan istanbul jewelry show ekim fuarı ’ nda bu yıl , yaklaşık 500 milyon dolarlık ihracat gerçekleşmesi hedefleniyor .
ubm rotaforte murahhas üye ve genel müdürü şermin cengiz , sektörün 2023 yılında ulaşmayı planladığı ihracat hedefi 12 milyar dolar olduğunu göz önüne alırsak türkiye 'nin bu hedefe ulaşmasında istanbul jewelry show 'un katkısı ve rolünün büyük önem taşıdığını belirtti.mücevher i̇hracatçıları birliği başkanı ayhan güner de fuar ile ilgili " mücevher i̇hracatçıları birliği olarak , sektörel büyüme ile birlikte , istanbul jewelry show ’ un da her geçen yıl büyüyerek , gerek katılımcı gerek ziyaretçi açısından dünya çapında bir fuar niteliğine bürünmesinden mutluluk duymaktayız ” değerlendirmesinde bulundu .
the court ’ s ruling leaves in place states ’ bans on same-sex marriage , but some experts say they ’ re now vulnerable to a challenge state by state .
consultative meeting in seoul . the pentagon chief reaffirmed the us commitment to support deterrence and wartime , and strengthens the integration of alliance capabilities to the catechesis of the good shepherd is an approach to the religious formation of children from age three through adolescence that was established and approved in the diocese of des moines more than ten years ago .
the catechesis of the good shepherd highlights essential aspects of the christian message that nurture the child ’ s need to love and be loved and the child ’ s capacity to enjoy god ’ s presence in her / his life .
it is rooted in the bible , the liturgy of the catholic church , and the educational principles of maria montessori .
one of the key features of the catechesis of the good shepherd is the use of catechetical materials specially designed for children .
another feature is the use of a prepared environment , called the atrium , to foster children 's religious life .
for more information please contact mary heinrich 515-278-5684 , ext.130 or mheinrich @ saintpiuschurch.org evening of prayer and preparation before conferal of the sacrament of confirmation the convenor of the conference is fr .
claudio barriga , sj , the secretary of the society of jesus on the apostleship of prayer in rome , who works directly under the general of the society of jesus .
the apostleship of prayer is for those who feel the need of god , and for those that want to associate their life and their heart to the life and heart of jesus .

29 , mcmaster hosted the university of guelph women ’ s soccer team in the squad ’ s second match-up of the season .
the marauders put forth a memorable performance that day – but not a positive one .
mcmaster ’ s display was the worst of the season , displaying no energy or urgency .
following the loss , head coach brett mosen was quick to apologize for the squad ’ s form and did not mince words when describing the game .
“ that game is the low point – performance-wise – since i ’ ve been at mac .
this is my third season and that was certainly the poorest performance i ’ ve seen .
we ’ ve got a lot of work to do to get it right , ” said mosen .
mosen partially chalks the performance up to a perfect storm of causes .
mac ’ s previous game required both the men and women ’ s squads to travel to windsor , ont. to take on the lancers .
the women ’ s side was able to pull out a 1-1 draw but grabbing the point came with a consequence .
mac did not return to hamilton until 3 a.m. and their fatigue showed in the gryphon tilt .
mosen had some positive comments after the guelph loss .
he lauded the play of rookies who have stepped up in what he describes as the “ worst season for injuries ” the seasoned coach has ever seen .
specifically , he pointed out anne yeboah for her talents in the offensive third and speculated that an oua rookie of the year award could be hers in the future .
mcmaster ’ s coaching staff will not waver from their original expectations and suspects the gryphon drubbing to serve as a reality check for the team .
“ the bubble has burst .
hard work has to come out now and make sure we ’ re still in contention to get into the playoffs , ” mosen said .
the new minstrels ( 1974-1980s ) was known for its smooth , sophisticated rendition of top 40 hits and the kundiman ( classic filipino songs ) that the show band successfully revived .
the pop version of mike velarde ’ s buhat catapulted the group to the top of the charts and established itself as a dominant force in philippine music .
as the members began embarking on solo pursuits , the band kept up the pace by recruiting new singers who came to be known as the second through the nth generations .

daniel bekele . & bdquo ; ce soutien renforce un groupe armé qui est responsable de nombreux meurtres , viols et autres crimes les rebelles du m23 ont exécuté sommairement au moins 44 personnes et violé au moins 61 femmes et filles depuis mars 2013 dans l ’ est de la république démocratique du congo ( rdc ) « affirme ce rapport publié ce 22 juillet .
hrw annonce avoir recueilli ces informations suite à plus de 100 entretiens réalisés depuis le mois de mars 2013 , comprenant des témoignages d ’ anciens combattants du m23 qui ont déserté ce mouvement entre fin mars et juillet ainsi que des civils vivant près de la frontière rwando-congolaise , dont nombreux sont hrw affirme que les combattants du m23 , mènent particulièrement une chasse à l ’ homme contre les populations de l ’ ethnie hutue dans les territoires qu ’ ils contrôlent . & bdquo ; les 25 et 26 avril , des combattants du m23 ont tué 15 civils d ’ ethnie hutue dans plusieurs villages du groupement de busanza dans le territoire de rutshuru , et au moins six autres à la mi-juin , apparemment pour & bdquo ; punir « les villageois pour leur prétendue collaboration avec des milices hutues le rapport fait également état de nombreux arrestations et enlèvements qui ont eu lieu au cours des dernières semaines dans le territoire de rutshuru par des combattants du m23 .
les victimes sont des dizaines de civils , la plupart d ’ ethnie hutue .
les personnes enlevées quand elles ne sont pas exécutées , sont & bdquo ; un ancien policier du m23 qui a déserté ce mouvement a rapporté à hrw qu ’ il avait participé à des enquêtes sur des meurtres de civils .
il a affirmé qu ’ avant chaque enquête , un commandant de haut rang du m23 , innocent kanyana lui disait : & bdquo ; c ’ est toi qui mènera l ’ enquête .
et tu diras que ce sont des bandits de la pendant l ’ attaque de la nuit du 25 avril , un groupe de combattants du m23 a traversé les villages de ruvumbura , kirambo , nyamagana et shinda , tuant et pillant sur leur passage .
une mère de trois enfants , âgée de 43 ans , a dit à hrw : & bdquo ; quand ils ont commencé à tuer des gens , nous avons fui dans la brousse .
mon mari est retourné chercher nos biens et ils l ’ ont tué .
ils lui ont tiré une balle dans la tête « . & bdquo ; dans la région de busanza , les combattants ont demandé de l ’ argent à une femme de 33 ans , quand elle a dit qu ’ elle n ’ en avait pas , ils ont entaillé son épaule d ’ un coup de machette et ont frappé son fils de 11 ans à d ’ autres cas d ’ exécutions sommaires par le m23 sont rapportés par hrw à l ’ instar de celui d ’ un homme de 62 ans qui a eu lieu fin mai à ntamugenga car ce dernier refusait de remettre ses fils au m23 ; l ’ assassinat le 15 mai d ’ un chauffeur de moto près de kiwanja parce qu ’ il refusait de leur donner de l ’ argent ; à la mi-juin , l ’ exécution par plusieurs balles dans la poitrine d ’ un plusieurs autres cas d ’ exécutions sommaires par le m23 , sur de nouvelles recrues qui tentaient de s ’ échapper ont également été rapportés .
le cas le plus interpellant est celui d ’ un déserteur connu sous le nom de tupac : & bdquo ; le 21 juin , les combattants du m23 ont capturé un des leurs , un congolais nommé & bdquo ; tupac « , alors qu ’ il essayait de s ’ enfuir près de kabuhanga .
ils l ’ ont ramené au camp militaire de kamahoro , où le commandant a ordonné à ses troupes de se mettre en formation et de l ’ abattre pour décourager d ’ autres désertions .
ils ont tué tupac de deux balles dans la poitrine tirées à bout portant « .
un déserteur du m23 a rapporté à hrw qu ’ il avait été forcé , avec d ’ autres recrues , d ’ enterrer tupac concernant les viols commis par le m23 , hrw affirme avoir documenté 61 cas de viol de femmes ou de filles par des combattants du m23 entre mars et début juillet , et affirme néanmoins qu ’ en raison de la marque d ’ infamie qui s ’ attache au viol et de la peur de représailles , le nombre réel des victimes est beaucoup plus élevé . & bdquo ; fréquemment , les violeurs avertissaient leurs victimes qu ’ elles seraient tuées si elles parlaient du viol ou si elles cherchaient à recevoir des & bdquo ; beaucoup des victimes de viol étaient dans leurs champs ou entrain de ramasser du bois .
les combattants du m23 ont accusé certaines d ’ entre elles d ’ être les & bdquo ; épouses « de combattants des fdlr .
la plupart des viols ont été commis à proximité des positions du m23 et certaines victimes ont reconnu leurs agresseurs comme étant des combattants du m23 qu ’ elles avaient vus auparavant « malgré le silence des victimes , le rapport de hrw mentionne plusieurs cas à l ’ instar de celui d ’ une fillette de 12 ans violée le 5 juillet par quatre combattants du m23 alors qu ’ elle cherchait de l ’ eau près de son village dans le territoire de rutshuru ; ou encore le cas d ’ un combattant du m23 qui le 15 avril 2013 près de bunagana a accosté une jeune femme de 18 ans et lui a tiré une balle dans la jambe parce qu ’ elle a refusé d ’ avoir une relation sexuelle avec des recrutements forcés au rwanda et en rdc impliquant même des jeunes selon hrw , les habitants de la région et des anciens rebelles ayant déserté ont fait état d ’ opérations récentes de recrutement forcé d ’ hommes et de garçons au rwanda et à l ’ est de la rdc pour le compte de m23 .
parmi les hommes recrutés au rwanda par le m23 , le rapport de hrw affirme que figurent de nombreux jeunes garçons majeurs mais aussi quelques mineurs .
il y des fdlr , dont la plupart avaient été intégrés dans la force de réserve de l ’ armée rwandaise , ainsi que des civils rwandais . & bdquo ; un jeune rwandais âgé de 15 ans a raconté à human rights watch que lui et trois autres jeunes hommes et garçons avaient reçu la promesse d ’ emplois en tant que gardiens de vaches en rd congo , mais qu ’ une fois arrivés dans ce pays , ils avaient été forcés de rejoindre le m23 .
ils y ont suivi une formation militaire dispensée par des officiers rwandais et on les a avertis qu ’ ils seraient abattus s ’ ils tentaient & bdquo ; de récents déserteurs du m23 interrogés par human rights watch ont décrit des arrivées fréquentes parfois hebdomadaires de militaires et de recrues en provenance du rwanda .
parfois il s ’ agissait de rotations , des hommes nouveaux en remplaçant d ’ autres qui étaient retournés au rwanda « poursuit le rapport .
hrw assure avoir documenté des dizaines de cas de recrutement de force par le m23 depuis mars , y compris d ’ enfants .
ces recrutements semblent même avoir augmenté au cours des derniers mois , depuis que le m23 a perdu plusieurs hommes ( morts et déserteurs ) , quand la faction du m23 dirigée par bosco ntaganda a subi une défaite en mars face à celle commandée par sultani makenga .
les cas de sept enfants rwandais , âgés de 15 , 16 et 17 ans , qui ont été recrutés de force au rwanda en mars et en avril , puis forcés de se battre dans les rangs du m23 , avant de parvenir à déserter ont également été recensés .
hrw affirme avoir reçu des informations concernant d ’ autres enfants recrutés au rwanda au cours de ces derniers mois et qui , eux , n ’ ont pas pu s ’ enfuir .
des recrutements forcés seraient également intenses en rdc , surtout dans les zones sous contrôle du m23 .
ainsi , & bdquo ; des commandants du m23 ont forcé des chefs coutumiers dans les zones qu ’ ils contrôlent à suivre une formation militaire et idéologique et à fournir des recrues au m23 .
le m23 considère ces chefs locaux comme constituant une & bdquo ; force de réserve « , sur laquelle ils veulent pouvoir néanmoins , tous les récents déserteurs du m23 interrogés par hrw ont déclaré qu ’ au cours des derniers mois , le gros de nouvelles recrues provient de plus en de nombreux bataillons de l ’ armes rwandaise se battent aujourd ’ hui aux côtés du m23 , et ce sont mêmes les officiers rwandais qui dirigent les opérations .
un ancien officier du m23 a indiqué à hrw que les femmes des officiers rwandais venaient souvent leur rendre visite dans les zones tenues par le m23 en rd congo , apportant des lettres de membres de leur famille restés au rwanda .
des habitants de la région et des rebelles déserteurs ont déclaré que & bdquo ; des mouvements réguliers du rwanda vers la rd congo d ’ hommes en uniforme de l ’ armée rwandaise et l ’ approvisionnement du m23 en munitions , en vivres et en autres par ailleurs , tous les déserteurs du m23 interrogés par hrw ont affirmé que la présence de militaires , d ’ officiers et de formateurs rwandais s ’ était poursuivie pendant toute la durée de leur engagement au sein du mouvement , et que de nouveaux renforts souvent déjà munis de divers équipements , notamment militaires continuaient d ’ arriver du rwanda au cours des derniers mois .
hrw mouvements d ’ hommes armés du rwanda vers l ’ est du congo pendant les jours ayant un déserteur congolais a rapporté à hrw , qu ’ au sein du m23 , les rwandais étaient favorisés . & bdquo ; on leur donne des uniformes immédiatement , des couvertures et des bottes .
ils sont gâtés .
quand ils parlent , c ’ est comme si ils étaient les patrons du mouvement .
ils me traitaient de vaut rien et disaient : & bdquo ; tu n ’ as aucune valeur dans ton pays « ils m ’ insultaient avec des mots qu ’ on ne peut prononcer trop fort .
ils disaient & bdquo ; vous les congolais , vous avez peut être fait des études mais vous n ’ avez jamais combattu au front . « « selon hrw , trois anciens officiers du m23 , proches de la hiérarchie du mouvement ont rapporté que les plus hauts commandants militaires du m23 supérieurs de l ’ armée rwandaise .
parfois , des officiers rwandais venaient à tshanzu ou à rumangabo pour rencontrer les chefs du m23 , parfois ce sont les dirigeants du m23 qui se rendaient au rwanda pour des réunions .
les informations circulant ces derniers jours nous apprennent même que plusieurs officiers rwandais auraient été tués d ’ autres blessés dans les combats de ces derniers jours , le général rwandais ibingira compterait parmi les blessés & bdquo ; au cours des 17 dernières années , l ’ armée rwandaise a à maintes reprises envoyé des troupes dans l ’ est de la rd congo et soutenu des forces agissant pour son compte et qui se sont rendues responsables d ’ exactions et de crimes de guerre « , a souligné daniel bekele directeur de la division afrique à hrw . & bdquo ; comme dans le passé , le rwanda nie qu ’ il soutient le m23 , mais les faits sur le terrain contredisent ces démentis . « poursuit-il .
par ailleurs , hrw affirme que , toutes les demandes d ’ entretien adressées à des responsables gouvernementaux et accusé depuis le début des hostilités à l ’ est du congo de ne pas avoir condamné ouvertement le rwanda , les états-unis ont adopté ce mardi le 23 juillet , un ton très sévère à l ’ encontre de kigali , le sommant de retirer ses troupes de la rdc et de cesser son soutien aux rebelles du m23 .
cet appel qui intervient au lendemain de la publication du rapport de hrw épinglant le rwanda pour son implication dans la crise congolaise à côté du m23 , est une première pour les etats-unis .
en effet washington s ’ était , jusque-là , contenté d ’ appeler tous les pays soutenant le m23 à cesser leur appui , sans mentionner les pays en question . & bdquo ; nous appelons le rwanda à cesser immédiatement tout soutien au mouvement du m23 , à retirer son personnel militaire de l ’ est de la rdc et à respecter ses engagements « , a déclaré ce mardi à la presse la porte-parole du département jennifer psaki a affirmé qu ’ il y avait un & bdquo ; ensemble de preuves crédibles « reliant les principaux dirigeants rwandais aux rebelles du m23 qui sèment le pour rappel , dans un rapport de l ’ onu le ministre rwandais de la défense , james kabarebe , est cité comme étant le véritable chef du m23 .
ots : závod commercial vehicle group c.i.e.b. získal najvyššie české podnikateľské ocenenie new albany , ohio 27. septembra ( tasr-ots ) ( prnewswire ) - spoločnosť commercial vehicle group , inc .
( nasdaq : cvgi ) , popredný dodávateľ plne integrovaných systémových riešení pre globálny trh s úžitkovými vozidlami , dnes oznámila , že jej závod c.i.e.b. v brandýse nad orlicí v českej republike získal ocenenie čekia stability award . c.i.e.b. vyrába sedadlá pre trhy s autobusmi , nákladnými automobilmi a inými úžitkovými vozidlami v európe .
ocenenie čekia stability award udeľuje spoločnosť bisnode a združenie czech top 100 . bisnode je popredný poskytovateľ informácií o podnikoch a spotrebiteľoch .
pomáha prevádzať údaje na informácie a poskytuje riadiace informácie týkajúce sa vzťahov zameraných na zákazníkov . ocenenie čekia stability award poskytuje nezávislý pohľad na finančný i nefinančný stav spoločností.závod c.i.e.b. získal najvyššie možné hodnotenie aaa v kategórii „ najstabilnejšia spoločnosť roka “ . model hodnotenia stability je založený na štatistickej analýze a informáciách pokrývajúcich demografické údaje , informácie o platobnom pozadí podniku , jeho finančné údaje , vzťahy s inými subjektmi a makroekonomické údaje . toto ocenenie osvedčuje , že spoločnosť uplatňuje zásady otvorenej komunikácie a poskytuje relevantné informácie o svojich obchodných výsledkoch a štruktúre vlastníctva.patrick miller , prezident globálnej divízie nákladných a iných úžitkových vozidiel a autobusov spoločnosti commercial vehicle group , poznamenal : „ som mimoriadne hrdý na to , že tím c.i.e.b. získal toto ocenenie a pomohol nám zaradiť sa medzi top-100 českých spoločností .
toto uznanie podčiarkuje angažovanosť spoločnosti cvg pri poskytovaní bezpečného , stabilného a vzrušujúceho pracovného prostredia založeného na tímovej práci , integrite , neustálom zlepšovaní sa , zápale a inováciách . “ „ len dve percentá všetkých spoločností registrovaných v českej republike spĺňajú kritériá na získanie tohto ocenenia . toto ocenenie informuje aktuálnym a potenciálnym zákazníkom c.i.e.b. , že majú do činenia so zdravým , stabilným a dôveryhodným partnerom , “ dodal miller.o spoločnosti commercial vehicle group , inc.commercial vehicle group je popredný dodávateľ kompletného sortimentu produktov pre kabíny a systémov pre globálny trh s úžitkovými vozidlami , vrátane trhu s ťažkými nákladnými vozidlami ( triedy 8 ) , trhov so stavebnými , vojenskými , poľnohospodárskymi zariadeniami a autobusmi a trhov so špeciálnymi prepravnými zariadeniami . medzi produkty spoločnosti patria systémy statických a odpružených sedadiel , elektronické káblové zväzky , ovládacie prvky a prepínače , konštrukcie a komponenty kabín , interiérové systémy ( vrátane prístrojových panelov , panelov dverí , strešných panelov , odkladacích priestorov a podlahových systémov ) , systémy zrkadiel a stieračov a špeciálne navrhnuté pre aplikácie v úžitkových vozidlách . spoločnosť sídli v new albany v štáte ohio a má prevádzky v severnej amerike , európe , ázii a austrálii .
informácie o spoločnosti a jej produktoch nájdete na adrese www.cvgrp.com.kontakt : john m. hyre , + 1- ( 614 ) 289-5157 , john.hyre @ cvgrp.comupozornenie : upozorňujeme odberateľov , že materiály označené skratkou ots sú poskytované v rámci originálnej textovej služby a za ich obsah nesie zodpovednosť zadávateľ.mš gl zóna verejného záujmuvaudreuil-dorion - nouvellessports jeux du québec - hiver 2013 - l 'étoile expérimentée et à leurs plateformes kck : akp hesabını seçime göre yapmış dünya gazetesionline abonelike-gazetei̇şte dünyanın en pahalı otomobili ! açıklama şöyle devam etti : " bu pakette açıklananlarla oyalama yapıp bir seçim daha kazanmaktan başka bir şey düşünülmediği anlaşılmıştır .
türkiye 'nin en temel sorununa bir seçim hesabı ekseninde yaklaşmak ve oyalama için toplumun önüne birkaç kırıntı atmak bu hükümetin bu sorunu çözme zihniyeti ve kapasitesinde olmadığını göstermiştir .
zaten yöntemi demokratik olmayan bir siyasi çalışmadan temel demokratikleşme sorunlarını çözmesi beklenemezdi . "

dakar , 30 septembre 2013 ( irin ) - les aliments de base enrichis , tels que la farine de blé et le sel , sont devenus courants dans les régions urbaines d 'afrique de l 'ouest en proie à la malnutrition .
en revanche , la biofortification est un phénomène relativement récent dans la région .
cette technique - qui consiste à cultiver des légumes , des céréales et des légumes secs à forte teneur nutritive - devrait connaître une croissance explosive au cours des dix prochaines années , d 'après les experts en sécurité alimentaire. the province by the same name , nampula is the main market in the north and is representative for the region , and has 19si jesus miingon ngadto sa mga pariseo : & ldquo ; may usa ka dato nga nagsul-ob sa labing mahal nga bisti ug nagpuyo nga luho kaayo .
20may usa usab ka kabus nga ginganlag lazaro , kansang lawas nalukop sa mga nuka , ug pagadad-on siya ngadto sa pultahan sa balay sa dato , 21basin na lang makakaon siya sa mga mumho nga mangatagak gikan sa lamesa sa dato .
ug bisan ang mga iro manuol ug motilap sa iyang mga nuka .
22unya namatay si lazaro ug gidala sa mga anghel ngadto sa kiliran ni abraham , didto sa kombira sa langit ; ang dato usab namatay ug gilubong , 23ug nag-antus pag-ayo didto sa hades .
unya miyahat siya ug iyang nakita si abraham didto sa layo , ug si lazaro sa tupad niya .
24busa misinggit siya ngadto kang abraham , ’ amahan !
kaloy-i intawon ako , ug ipadala si lazaro diri aron itunlob ang iyang tudlo sa tubig ug pabugnawan ang akong dila , kay nag-antus ako pag-ayo sa kainit niining kalayo ! ’ 25apan si abraham mitubag , ’ anak , hinumdomi nga sa didto ka pa sa kalibutan , nabuhong ka sa tanang maayong butang , samtang si lazaro lunlon lamang dautan ang nahiagoman .
apan karon malipayon na siya diri , samtang ikaw diha nag-antus .
26gawas pa niana , anaay lawom nga bung-aw nga nag-ulang kanato , aron kadtong buot motabok nganha kanimo gikan diri dili makahimo , ni ang anaa diha makatabok ngari kanamo .
27ang dato mitubag , ’ kon mao kana , amahan , hangyoon ko ikaw nga imo untang ipadala si lazaro ngadto sa amo , 28diin ako may lima ka igsuong lalaki .
paadtoa siya aron sila kapasidan-an ug dili mahianhi niining dapit sa kasakitan . ’ 29si abraham miingon , ’ atua didto si moises ug ang mga propeta nga magpasidaan kanila ; sila nay mahibalo sa pagpamati sa ilang isulti . ’ 30ang dato mitubag , ’ apan amahan , kana dili pa igo !
kon adunay mabanhaw ug moadto kanila , mamiya gayod sila sa ilang mga sala . ’ 31apan miingon si abraham , ’ kon dili sila mamati kang moises ug sa mga propeta , dili gayod sila makabig bisan pag may mabanhaw . ’ & rdquo ; ang ebanghelyo sa ginoo .
19si jesus miingon ngadto sa mga pariseo : & ldquo ; may usa ka dato nga nagsul-ob sa labing mahal nga bisti ug nagpuyo nga luho kaayo .
namatikdan na ni jesus bisan sa iyang panahon : anaay mga dato ra kaayo , anaay kabus ra usab kaayo .
20may usa usab ka kabus nga ginganlag lazaro , kansang lawas nalukop sa mga nuka ...
ang dato walay ngalan .
tingali hinganlan nato siyag & ldquo ; kaugalingon & rdquo ; .
apan ang kabus may ngalan : lazaro .
kining ngalana sa hebreo mao ang el ’ azar , nga nagkahulogan og & ldquo ; ang dios mitabang & rdquo ; .
mao ra kini ang sambingay diin ang usa sa mga nahilambigit may ngalan ! 21basin na lang makakaon siya sa mga mumho nga mangatagak gikan sa lamesa sa dato .
ug bisan ang mga iro manuol ug motilap sa iyang mga nuka .
adunay drama diha sa paghulagway ni jesus : sa sulod sa balay anaa ang daghang pagkaon ug luhong panimuyo ; samtang sa gawas , anaa ang tumang kaalaot ug kahimtang nga patay-gutom .
22unya namatay si lazaro ug gidala sa mga anghel ngadto sa kiliran ni abraham , didto sa kombira sa langit ; ang dato usab namatay ug gilubong , 23aug nag-antus pag-ayo didto sa hades .
dakong kabalit-ad sa hulagway .
ang kabus nga nag-antos samtang dinhi pa sa kalibutan , karon nagmalipayon !
samtang ang dato dinhi sa kalibutan , naglunang sa tumang kalisod !
wala kita sultihi nga ang kabus nagbaton og daghang maayong birtud ug ang dato dautan .
gitug-anan lamang kita nga ang usa & ldquo ; dato & rdquo ; , samtang ang usa & ldquo ; kabus & rdquo ; .
ang dato wala usab magbuhat og kadaot o panglupig sa kabus .
gisaysay lamang niining sambingay nga ang dato wala magpakabana sa kabus !
iyang gipahimugso ang dakong bung-aw nga maoy nakapalayo kaayo kanilang duha .
23b ... unya miyahat siya ug iyang nakita si abraham didto sa layo , ug si lazaro sa tupad niya .
24busa misinggit siya ngadto kang abraham , ’ amahan !
kaloy-i intawon ako , ug ipadala si lazaro diri aron itunlob ang iyang tudlo sa tubig ug pabugnawan ang akong dila , kay nag-antus ako pag-ayo sa kainit niining kalayo ! ’
ang puloy-anan sa laing kinabuhi gilarawan nga & ldquo ; dapit--puy-anan sa mga patay & rdquo ; o sheol diin anaa ang mga lawas , tudlo , kalayo , tubig .
usa kini ka dapit diin anaa ang panaglayo tali niadtong mga pinili ug niadtong mga sinilotan .
usa ka dapit diin ang mga dato na mao ang nanginahanglan sa mga kabus ! 25apan si abraham mitubag , ’ anak , hinumdomi nga sa didto ka pa sa kalibutan , nabuhong ka sa tanang maayong butang , samtang si lazaro lunlon lamang dautan ang nahiagoman .
apan karon malipayon na siya diri , samtang ikaw diha nag-antus .
26 & hellip ; anaay lawom nga bung-aw nga nag-ulang kanato , aron kadtong buot motabok nganha kanimo gikan diri dili makahimo ...
pinaagi sa mga pulong ni abraham , si jesus makusganon nga mipasabot kabahin sa & ldquo ; pribihiliyo sa mga kabus & rdquo ; .
sa ebanghelyo makit-an nato ang pagpili kang jesus pabor sa mga kabus ( lukas 1 : 53 ; 4 : 18 ; 6 : 20 , 24 ; 12 : 15-21 ; 16 : 9-11 ) .
si jesus nasayod sa duha ka katalagman o kakuyaw sa kadato : una .
motak-op kini sa kasingkasing ngadto sa ginoo .
tungod kay anaa na man ang tanan niining kinabuhia , makalimot hinoon sa sunod pang kinabuhi .
ikaduha .
motak-op kini sa kasingkasing ngadto sa isigkatawo .
mao nga ang dato daw wala makakita sa kabus nga nagkamang sa iyang ubos nga nahimutangan .
ang impyerno mao diay ang dapit nga halayo ang ginoo ug halayo ang isigkatawo .
kita ra usab ang nagmugna sa atong kaugalingong langit kon dinhi sa yuta haduol na kita sa dios ug sa isigkatawo .
27ang dato mitubag , ’ kon mao kana , amahan , hangyoon ko ikaw nga imo untang ipadala si lazaro ngadto sa amo , 28diin ako may lima ka igsuong lalaki .
paadtoa siya aron sila kapasidan-an ug dili mahianhi niining dapit sa kasakitan . ’
ang pakiluoy sa dato naghulagway sa hilabihang kapait sa iyang nahimutangan ! 29si abraham miingon , ’ atua didto si moises ug ang mga propeta nga magpasidaan kanila ; sila nay mahibalo sa pagpamati sa ilang isulti . ’ 30ang dato mitubag , ’ apan amahan , kana dili pa igo !
kon adunay mabanhaw ug moadto kanila , mamiya gayod sila sa ilang mga sala . ’
laing sanglitanan sa & ldquo ; paghangyo og kahibulongang ilhanan & rdquo ; .
milagro aron kami mutuo !
ang tawo mutuo lamang kon adunay ilhanan !
apan makadaghan si jesus wala gayod mobuhat og mga dinagkong ilhanan ( lukas 11 : 16-29 ; markos 8 : 11-12 , mateo 12 : 38 ; 16 : 1 ) .
31apan miingon si abraham , ’ kon dili sila mamati kang moises ug sa mga propeta , dili gayod sila makabig bisan pag may mabanhaw . ’ & rdquo ; sa tinuod , ang pagkabanhaw ni lazaro , ang igsoon nila ni marta ug maria sa betania , wala gayod makapatuo sa mga pariseo ug mga punuang-pari , hinoon maoy nakapatukmod nila sa pagsalikway kang jesus .

welcome to the web site for the diocese of duluth .
we hope you will visit often to stay abreast of the news and information for the catholic church in northeastern minnesota .
having worked in lusaka and mumbwa after completing school in 1999 , palaza settled for a job at mukambi off the lusaka-mongu road .
" i worked for mumbwa cotton ginnery until 2003 when i started to teach at the community school .
in 2007 , i come here at mukambi .
it was on august 11 , 2011 as i was walking to report for work in the morning with a workmate from the workers compound ( about 500 metres from the lodge ) when i saw an elephant .
it was at a distant and i thought we could pass .
together with my friend we decided to use another road but unfortunately it had seen us and charged , " palaza said .
" we started to run ; my friend was in front of me and i screamed at her to hold my hand but when she turned around to check on me , the elephant had already reached near us .
i fell down and i don 't know if it was out of fear or not but when i fell down the elephant come over me and made some trumpeting roar and i knew that i was dead .
thereafter i don 't know what happened ; i fainted and i only woke up in the hospital and remembered that an elephant had chased after me , " she says .
" i had injuries on my side but i don 't know if there were caused by the elephant or by my falling .
all i know was that the elephant was above me when i fell .
in the hospital i spent two days and thereafter i went to the village where i spent another two months before returning here to resume my work , " palaza said .
she said she is still haunted by memories of the incident .
" every time i see elephants i see visions of an elephant chasing me .
however , i believe that god was with me because i have heard a lot of stories of how people get killed by elephant trampling .
people say that when an elephant charges at a person it tramples on them , but i don 't know why i was not trampled upon , " she said .
" i had gone fishing with my friends after work and we did not know that there was a hippo in front of us .
it charged at us and we turned and started to run but the hippo kept on coming after us .
so what happened was that i was wearing a bright shirt and he picked on me .
i ended up climbing a tree but it was a short one where i could reach my legs down and stamp on its back .
i stamped its back and several times and it ran away , " she said .
her husband , victor on the other hand said his long stay in the knp and at mukambi in particular was motivated by his passion for working with wild animals .
he said he was first afraid to work in the area due to its many elephants but drew encouragement from his superiors who trained him on how to live with and around wild animals .
" we were walking in the plain and we saw an elephant and my boss said i should squat down , but the elephant did not turn to walk away and came towards us .
this experience unsettled me and despite assurances from my boss that all was okay , i was not myself as i thought that the elephant was going to squash us .

à sainte-séraphine , une petite municipalité du centre-du-québec située non loin de victoriaville , l 'enjeu des prochaines élections porte sur les petits fruits !
les petits fruits en question , ce sont les canneberges .
la mairesse monique paquin veut interdire la production des canneberges sur une grande partie du territoire de sa municipalité , et ce , même si les terrains en question sont zonés agricoles .
le conseil municipal a en effet adopté un règlement en ce sens , lequel a été désapprouvé par la mrc d 'arthabaska en raison de son schéma d 'aménagement .
qu 'à cela ne tienne , la mairesse a sollicité la commission municipale du québec ( cmq ) , qui voit à régler ce genre de différend .
au mois de juin , la cmq , par l 'intermédiaire de la juge administrative , nancy lavoie , a donné raison à la mrc .
en juillet , dans un conseil municipal divisé 3 à 3 , la mairesse s 'est entêtée et a utilisé son vote prépondérantpour trancher en faveur d 'une résolution permettant d 'aller en appel , en cour supérieure , occasionnant des frais de toutes sortes , sur le bras des contribuables bien sûr .
il faut savoir que la culture de canneberges exige beaucoup d 'eau , avec des impacts sur la nappe phréatique et les boisés environnants , disent ceux qui sont contre .
mme paquin y est allée toutefois un peu fort en déclarant : " à lac mégantic , ils ont été brûlés .
nous , on ne veut pas être noyés " .
d 'autant plus que la mairesse paquin a été élue par une mince majorité lors d 'élections partielles en avril 2012 à la suite d 'une série de démissions au conseil municipal , toujours à cause de la même chicane !
les pro-canneberges , appuyés par l 'upa , sont en colère .
c 'est david vincent , lui-même cultivateur , qui s 'opposera à mme paquin dans la course à la mairie .
de plus , une poursuite a été intentée contre la municipalité par une cannebergière , les bassins rouges , un procès qui débutera en janvier 2014 .
quant à la décision de la cour supérieure , elle n 'est pas attendue avant le mois de novembre .
un jeune homme qui est passé près de mourir a décidé de se lancer en politique municipale moins de six mois après sa greffe des poumons .
richard leboeuf-mcgregor n 'avait pas vu les choses comme ça , il prévoyait partir en voyage .
après une longue attente , il a eu sa greffe en mars dernier , au moment où il était attaqué par deux pneumonies et fortement déshydraté .
les médecins lui ont conseillé de prendre une année sabbatique avant de recommencer à travailler .
mais il a été approché par projet montréal et le voilà candidat dans le district pointe-aux-prairies .
sur sa page d 'accueil de projet montréal , il est écrit que " m. leboeuf-mcgregor veut défendre et protéger les espaces verts qui sont nombreux dans l ’ arrondissement , et qui sont les poumons de l ’ est de montréal … en plus des enjeux d ’ éthiques et de corruption , il se sent particulièrement interpellé par le problème de la pollution atmosphérique , qui est criant dans l ’ est de montréal " .
richard leboeuf-mcgregor dit être motivé pour amener un regard différent sur la politique .
il sera en effet bien placé pour en parler !
one scientist has likened the work to ' trying to record the new york philharmonic from the other side of a concrete wall , while a guy is using a jackhammer on the wall and someone is playing with the volume control . '
cold air tends to be clear and free of moisture , which can distort light .
bratislava 30. septembra ( tasr-ots ) - už po štvrtýkrát prináša lidl svojim zákazníkom nevšedný zážitok v podobe kolekcie exkluzívnych francúzskych vín .
výberové vína z najznámejších vinárskych oblastí francúzska budete mať možnosť ochutnať v rámci tematickej predajnej akcie , ktorá sa začala v pondelok 30. septembra 2013 v predajniach lidl .
v spolupráci s odborníkmi pre vás spoločnosť lidl nakupovala vína vo francúzsku priamo od majiteľov jednotlivých chateaux a vybrala tie najlepšie klenoty z vychýrených provincií bordeaux , côtes du rhône , burgundsko , languedoc-roussillon či alsasko .
po mimoriadnom úspechu predošlých akcií na francúzske vína si tentoraz môžete dopriať takmer 60 jedinečných vín ( ročníky 2005 – 2012 ) najlepšej kvality za skvelé ceny .
ako sprievodca pri výbere vám poslúži brožúra s popisom jednotlivých ročníkov a druhov vín , v ktorej nájdete množstvo užitočných informácií o vychýrených vinárskych oblastiach francúzska a tiež o vhodných kombináciách vína s jedlom . „ v tejto ponuke som našiel vína na každodenný konzum , ale aj vína k výnimočným udalostiam či do archívu .
nakoľko sa v súčasnosti všade skloňuje slovo kríza , stále viac dôležitosti upriamuje aj vinársky svet na pomer medzi cenou a kvalitou vína .
a práve s takýmito vínami máme do činenia v tejto špeciálnej ponuke .
pamätajte však , že dobré víno nemusí byť zákonite to najdrahšie .
práve naopak , nájdete tu aj veľmi príjemné vína s príjemne ľahkým ovocným charakterom za priaznivú cenu .
na druhej strane sa tu nájdu aj výnimočné vína , ku ktorým sa nedostanete každý deň , “ zhodnotil ponuku francúzskych vín spoločnosti lidl someliér gabriel kollár .
preneste sa do slnkom zaliatych viníc a vychutnávajte si poklady , ktoré francúzsko vo svojich sadoch skrýva .
doprajte si nevšedný zážitok z prvotriedneho vína a vytvorte si doma neopakovateľnú atmosféru luxusu .
lahodnú chuť vynikajúceho vína najvyššej kvality si užijete za tradične bezkonkurenčné ceny .
fľašku vína si môžete zadovážiť už za 1,99 € , cenové rozpätie končí na hranici 14,99 € .
drvivú väčšinu vín však kúpite za menej ako 10 € .
urobte si z každého dňa malý sviatok , veď aj známe francúzske príslovie hovorí , že „ deň bez vína je ako deň bez slnka “ .
upozornenie : upozorňujeme odberateľov , že materiály označené skratkou ots sú poskytované v rámci originálnej textovej služby a za ich obsah nesie zodpovednosť zadávateľ.lt gl facilitations and measures taken by the italian government to encourage fluctuating oil prices ?
establish an oil stabilisation fund or , in other words , budget cautiously .
concerned that the oil will run out ?
invest in a savings fund for future generations .

in the middle of the section to the right , enter http : / / www.kob.com terms of useshankle , brydson 2013 silsbee wall of honor recipients on the bee sylvia brydson is a 1985 graduate of silsbee high school .
her times of 0.54 for the 400-meter dash and 2 : 10.68 in the 800-meter run set in 1985 , are still school records .
during her tenure at lsu , she was an 8-time sec champion .
she tied for seventh in team history for sec event titles won in a career .
she currently resides in beaumont and has two children , alexandria and jacory .

his senior year. he batted .400 and was chosen for all-district .
he was also a member of the track team his senior year .
in 1980 , he played for the san diego chargers in the nfl , and calgary stampeeders in the cfl .
n korea in ' state of war ' with southnorth korea has said it is entering a ' state of war ' with south korea in its latest escalation of rhetoric against its southern neighbour and the us bratislava 11. marca ( tasr ) - tlačová agentúra ( ta ) sr skončila rok 2012 so ziskom vo výške 13.974 eur .
pred parlamentným mediálnym výborom to dnes povedal generálny riaditeľ tasr jaroslav rezník .
súhrnné náklady dosiahli podľa jeho slov za druhý polrok výšku 1.827.484 eur .
dodal , že v porovnaní s prvým polrokom stúpla výška nákladov o 9,1 % .
" celkové výnosy za hodnotené obdobie dosiahli čiastku 1.934.326 eur , čo v porovnaní s prvým polrokom predstavuje nárast o 22,3 % .
týmto agentúra ukončila druhý polrok so ziskom vo výške 106.842 eur , čím sa zmiernil nepriaznivý vývoj hospodárskeho výsledku vykázaný za prvý polrok .
rok 2012 tlačová agentúra skončila so ziskom vo výške 13.974 eur , " povedal rezník .
zároveň informoval , že tasr vydala v hodnotenom období 123.190 multimediálnych správ .
" v slovnom spravodajstve priniesla 71.302 správ , vydala 7603 zvukov , 40.935 fotografií a 3350 videospráv , " konkretizoval rezník .
ďalej uviedol , že tasr vlani spustila spravodajský web www.teraz.sk , ktorým sa spravodajstvo agentúry dostalo bližšie verejnosti .
tasr tiež spustila mobilnú verziu stránky .
agentúra má tiež web , zameraný na voľný čas a životný štýl .
" cieľom portálu webmagazin.sk je vytvoriť platformu pre rekreatívne a magazínové témy , " vysvetlil generálny riaditeľ .
pripomenul aj spustenie prvého študentského spravodajského web www.skolskyservis.sk.
" web vychádza z niekoľkoročnej systémovej spolupráce tasr so školami a z budovania portfólia redaktorov z radov študentov a žiakov .
stovky redaktorov – juniorov , ktorí píšu pre agentúru , tak dostali samostatnú platformu pre zverejňovanie svojich správ s pravidelným redakčným usmernením a spätnou väzbou , " povedal rezník s tým , že web skolskyservis.sk pod hlavičkou národnej tlačovej agentúry je " unikátny spôsob posilňovania poslania verejnoprávneho média a budovania dôvery vo verejnoprávny produkt " .
rezník tiež informoval , že agentúra bude digitalizovať svoje archívy , na čo získala finančné prostriedky z eurofondov .
" proces digitalizácie sa začne v roku 2013 a potrvá do roku 2015 .
celkovo pôjde o digitalizáciu vyše milióna fotografií , novinových článkov , záznamov denného spravodajstva , ktoré sú v archíve tasr uložené vo forme negatívov , pozitívov , diapozitívov , mikrofišov , voľných listov , novinových tematických databáz , " priblížil generálny riaditeľ tasr .
lenddo ’ s achievement was honored at the forum ’ s annual meeting of the new champions 2013 in dalian , people ’ s republic of china last month .

ev ve plaj giyimi tasarım yarışmasıdenizli i̇hracatçılar birliği ( deni̇b ) başkanı süleyman kocasert , türkiye 'nin moda sektöründe katma değeri yüksek ürünlerle markalaşmak zorunda olduğunu söyledi.dericilere vergi müjdesirusya bavul ticareti yerine resmi ticaret istiyorhasan samancı , tekstil sektörü için rusya ’ nın halen çok önemli bir pazar olduğunu , ancak rusların bavul ticareti yerine resmi ticaret istediklerini söyledi.tekstilde bir kötü haber daha13 ay önce iflas erteleme isteyen abdullah çınar ’ ın 4 şirketi için iflas kararı verildi .
sektörde sevilen isimlerden biri olan abdullah çınar , “ büyüme hevesiyle babamın öğüdünü dinlemedim , pişmanım ” dedi . ‘ tekstil ve hazır giyim sektörü ’ geleceğe hazır mı ? dünya ekonomi denizcilik ve lojistik tv 'nin yeni programı sektör zirvesi 'nde tekstil ve hazır giyim sektörü masaya yatırıldı ... tekstil bölümünü tercih eden işsiz kalmaz250 milyon lira cirolu tükek holding geliyoryüksek teknolojili tekstil üretimi yapan flokser grubu , franchise 'la hızlı büyüyor , 250 milyon lira ciroya gidiyor.tekstilde en fazla ihracat dokuma kumaştabu yılın ilk 7 ayında tekstil ve hammaddeleri sektöründe yapılan ihracatın yüzde 34,2 'si dokuma kumaşta yapıldı.çocuklar bayramda tekstilcileri sevindirdii̇flas ertelemelerle son dönemde sıkıntılı bir sürece giren tekstil sektöründe çocuklar , firmalara bayram sevinci yaşattı .
gezi eylemleri nedeni ile düşen satışlar , bayram sezonunda kimi firmada yüzde 100 ’ e yakın arttı.ayakkabıcı ayaklandı : araplar , çin 'de ürettirip ' türk malı ' diye satıyor ! suudi arabistan ’ da tüccarlar , türk malıayakkabıların bire bir kopyalarını çin ’ de yaptırarakmade in turkey damgasıyla satmaya başlayınca , türk ayakkabı sektörü ayaklandı.hazır giyimci teşvikle en çok 5 .

during the meeting , gundogdu said that it was a huge step for future reforms in our country and it would speak up for those who have been marginalized for years .
gundogdu recalled that they have collected 12.3 million signatures so far for the liberation of headscarf for civil servants in public institutions and thanked celik for this contributions to this reform .

pcs.production.1.20130918.1036 ( pewsuwvmwapp01 ) problema sa anak | dr. love , pilipino star ngayon sections , pilipino star ngayon | philstar.com kumusta po kayo ?
matagal na akong avid reader ng malaganap ninyong column at nag ­ lakas loob na sumulat din sa inyo para humingi ng payo .
tawagin n ’ yo na lang akong milagros , 40 anyos , may asawa at limang anak .
problema ko po ang anak kong babae na 17 anyos , na sa maagang edad ay nagkaroon ng boyfriend .
hindi ako tutol makipag-boyfriend ang anak ko pero sana ay sa bahay lang sila nagkikita .
ni minsan hindi ko nakita ang mukha ng lalaki dahil ­ may nakapagsabi lang sa akin na ang anak ko at siya ay nagkikita sa labas .
nang tanungin ko ang anak ko ay umamin siya pero bakit ganyan ang attitude ng mga kaba ­ taan ?
nang sawayin ko siya sa pakikipagtagpo ng lihim sa lalaki ay nagalit siya .
wala raw akong tiwala sa kanya .
minor de edad pa ang anak mo at talagang dapat mo siyang gabayan at pangaralan .
kaso tila mayroon na siyang masamang atti ­ tude ­ .
baka naman hindi mo ginawa ang poder ­ mo bilang ina at nagkulang ka ng disiplina .
ayaw kong sisihin ka pero habang maaga ay matuto kang magdisiplina ng anak .
huwag mong ipakitang natatakot ka kapag sumasagot siya ng pabalang-balang .
at ano ang ginagawa ng iyong asawa para isuheto ang inyong anak ?
pag-usapan ninyong mag-asawa iyan at baka maging dalagang ina ang batang iyan .

le calendrier comprend les événements que nous prévoyons couvrir et ceux que nous ne couvrirons pas mais qui sont jugés assez pertinents pour les partager avec la média .
soumettez les détails de votre événement en utilisant le formulaire ci-dessous et nous l ’ ajouterons à notre calendrier si nos rédacteurs jugent qu ’ il mérite d ’ être signalé ! note : en plus d ’ acheminer les détails de votre événement à notre salle de rédaction , ils seront également envoyé au personnel de notre service d ’ affection photo et vidéo qui pourront communiquer avec vous pour vous donner plus de renseignements sur les options de photographie et vidéographie disponibles pour votre événement . infos requises à propos de votre événement : ce formulaire n ’ est pas conçu pour soumettre des communiqués de presse .
les communiqués de presse sont les mieux envoyés à la presse canadienne via un distributeur communiqué de presse comme marketwired . confidentialité : ce formulaire est confidentiel.nous ne vendons , ne louons ou ne donnons pas votre information à aucune tierce partie . المتوسط لسوء الاحوال الجويةبتراالسرور يشارك في مؤتمر الجمعية البرلمانية للاتحاد البرلماني الدوليبترااستمرار الترشح لبرلمان الطفل في مركز الأميرة سلمى بالزرقاءبترا4400 طالب يهودي يهجرون المدارس الدينية pcs.production.1.20130918.1036 ( pewsuwvmwapp02 ) the mayday button may actually convince you to buy the kindle fire hdx i decided to test out mayday by asking the customer representative to walk me through setting up my email .
we actually couldn 't get my huffpost email set up -- he suggested that i reach out to our own it department for that -- but he got my personal gmail up and running in minutes .
he circled icons , drew arrows to buttons and scrolled up and down , explaining to me the whole time what he was doing , and prompting me to enter my information .
it was almost seamless -- there was no lag in either the video or in what he was doing on my tablet 's screen .
the only glitch was that at the end of the mayday call , the video froze and i lost my connection to him .
but it 's unclear if that was a problem on amazon 's end or due to my own wi-fi network .

fews mise à jour sur la sécurité alimentaire septembre 2013 burkina faso : aperçu humanitaire sur les inondations de 2013 ( 27 aôut 2013 ) burkina faso burkina faso : aperçu humanitaire sur les inondations de 2013 ( 27 aôut 2013 ) la saison pluvieuse de 2013 a provoqué des inondations dans certaines localités .
a ce jour , selon le conasur , 4 régions ont été touchées : est , boucle du mouhoun , sahel , hauts-bassins .
seul 1 / 3 des fonds nécessaires pour répondre aux besoins humanitaires sont mobilisés au début du quatrième trimestre de l ’ année .
des millions de personnes dans le nord et le sud du pays continuent de compter sur l ’ assistance pour leur protection et pour avoir accès à la nourriture , aux soins de santé , à l ’ eau , à l ’ éducation et à un abris adéquat .
burkina faso burkina faso mise à jour sur la sécurité alimentaire septembre 2013 la reprise régulière de la pluviométrie depuis la fin juillet a permis un développement satisfaisant des cultures .
une récolte céréalière au moins moyenne est attendue dans le pays .
la récolte des produits agricoles verts a déjà commencée par les ménages qui ont accès au mil hâtif , au maïs , à l ’ arachide fraîche et aux tubercules .
le mil , le maïs et le sorgho sont les produits alimentaires les plus importants pour la consommation ménagère .
le mil est le produit de base des ménages les plus vulnérables , tandis que le maïs et le sorgho contribuent aussi au panier alimentaire de la majorité des autres ménages .
le marché de sankaryare est le plus vaste et le plus important d ’ ouagadougou ; il approvisionne d ’ autres marchés du pays et dans la région .
koudougou se trouve dans l 'une des régions les plus peuplées du pays , où une majorité des ménages dépend du marché pour son ravitaillement alimentaire .
he said he has met with officials of the department of public works and highways to iron out " kinks " in the project .
he added that the project was bidded out already at p60 million .

it ’ ll have you playing air guitar while getting dressed and joining in on the simple but cathartic chorus of “ let it out , let it out , let it out ” .
‘ dumb ’ is the perfect opportunity to indulge in your anxious self-loathing ( and maybe feel a bit better by the end ) .
as if the tape couldn ’ t get any better , it closes out with a ridiculously good cover of the muffs ’ ‘ every single thing ’ .
the muffs !
so 90 ’ s !

should you be so inclined , you can listen to one song from it on their bandcamp now .
if i hadn ’ t made it clear , this ’ ll be the best dollar you ever spend .

democratic republic of the congo + 1 other nord-kivu : plus de 30 écoles n ’ ont pas encore repris les cours à cause de l ’ insécurité une trentaine d ’ écoles n ’ ont toujours pas ouvert leurs portes dans les territoires de beni et walikale à cause de l ’ insécurité , un mois après la date fixée pour la rentrée scolaire 2013 – 2014 en rdc .
le porte-parole de la société civile du nord-kivu , omar kavota l ’ a déclaré lundi 30 septembre , ajoutant que les écoles de kamango , le chef-lieu de la chefferie de watalinga ont été délocalisées vers nobili et kikura .
les autorités scolaires provinciales reconnaissent la complexité de cette question et que des efforts sont entrepris pour y apporter une réponse .
democratic republic of the congo + 1 other rdc : une délégation du conseil de sécurité de l & # 039 ; onu attendue le 4 octobre kinshasa , 29 septembre 2013 ( afp ) - une délégation du conseil de sécurité de l 'onu doit se rendre en république démocratique du congo puis au rwanda en fin de semaine prochaine , notamment pour encourager les efforts de pacification dans l 'est congolais , a-t-on appris dimanche auprès de la mission de l 'onu pour la stabilisation de la rdc ( monusco ) .
democratic republic of the congo + 1 other nord-kivu : tension à miriki suite au meurtre d ’ un défenseur des droits de l ’ homme une vive tension a été observée , mercredi 25 septembre , dans la localité de miriki , à environ 190 km au sud de butembo ( nord-kivu ) , après la découverte du corps de mokili muhima , un défenseur des droits de l ’ homme .
les habitants sont descendus dans la rue pour protester contre cet assassinat mais ils ont été empêchés de manifester par les rebelles des forces démocratiques pour la libération du rwanda ( fdlr ) qui contrôlent cette contrée. important .
beans and maize are cultivated generally in all districts of the le haricot est la denrée alimentaire la plus consomée dans toutes les régions du rwanda .
le maïs , le manioc , la pomme de terre , la patate douce at la banane sont aussi importants .
le haricot et le maïs sont normalement cultivés dans tous les districts , la pomme de terre est prédominante au nord et à l ’ ouest du pays et la banane à l ’ est .
les prix des denrées alimentaires sont généralement bas en janvier-février après les récoltes de la saison a , ainsi qu ’ en juillet-aout après les récoltes de la saison b. how has the impact of conflict on living conditions and water changed over the last few decades ?

gwen garcia ngadto sa bag-ong haon nga gobernador .
sulod sa usa ka gatos ka adlaw sa pagtimon ni gov. junjun davide sa renda sa kapitolyo sayo pa nga paninglan sa iyang mga nahimo .
kutob pa lang sa pag-ayag sa mga plano .
sa pagtugyan ni garcia ngadto ni davide sa opisyal nga silyo nunot sa pinintal nga kwadro sa señor santo niño isip gasa gipanghinaot nga mapadayon ang wala matibawas nga mga mihuras kay mibabag ang politikanhong gumunhap .
maisip nga mga hagit ang pagpalambo sa 80 ka esktaryang luna sa kanhi kampo sa military sa lahug , pagpadayon sa kasabotan tali sa kapitolyo ug sa 32 ka home ­ owners ubos sa ord. 93-1 , la ciudad project sa banilad sa gahin nga p1.2b , pagsagop sa public-private joint ventures sama sa filinvest nga nagtukod og business process outsour ­ cing complex sa lahug , pag-ugmad sa bulto nga mga tinubdan sa tubig , kapalaran sa balili nga himuong export processing zone nga ilakip ang waste-to-energy project ug ang paghikutar sa tugpa ­ hanan sa san francisco ug bantayan .
gibinlan ni gwen si davide og p791m nga salapi sa mga bangko nga naglangkob sa s17,728 dollar account , p351.069m gene ­ ral fund , p118.997m special education fund , p321.4m trust fund ug p28.1b nga assets .
walay utang ang kapitolyo sa mga financial institutions gawas sa bayranan sa mga supplier ug kontraktor nga nag ­ hatod og serbisyo .
nanukad pa ang administrasyon ni davide nga gihanig ang mga nabuhat ni gwen kabahin sa mga inprastraktura , panubig , korente , panglawas , edukasyon , kalikopan , pagpreserbar sa kabilin ug uban pang batakang serbis ­ yo .
panahon ni gwen , ang kapitolyo nakatimaan og sisterhood agreements tali sa 14 ka mga siyudad ug probinsya sa nagkalain-laing kanasoran .
ang pagpatrabaho sa mga kaliwat sa opisyal sa gobyerno kaniadto pa gipraktis .
dunay balaod nga magsilot sa nepotismo ug daynastiya apan walay ngipon .
lagos ra .
mao kini giingon nga weather-weather lang .
importante nga makatuman sa gisaad nga kalamboan .
dili nalang maghisgot og delicadeza kay kinahanglan ang tigkutaw og kape kaliwat kay kon lain , kuyaw og butangag hilo sa ok-ok. you on a downhill track to a heart attack ?

polls -- most north carolinians disapprove of barack obama and pat mccrory designed & developed by primus ots : eú a rusko budú hľadať riešenie pre južný prúd v rámci tretieho ... - ots - tasr.sk ots : eú a rusko budú hľadať riešenie pre južný prúd v rámci tretieho energetického balíka , hovorí námestník ruského ministra energetiky v miláne prezentovali vedúci predstavitelia južného prúdu a spoločnosti gazprom hodnotu plynovodu pre európumiláno 1. októbra ( tasr-ots ) ( prnewswire ) - bezpečnosť dodávok , diverzifikácia zdrojov energie a pevné partnerstvo medzi energetickými podnikmi v európe : to boli hlavné témy , ktorým sa venovala konferencia " južný prúd : evolúcia plynovodu " , ktorá sa konala dnes v miláne , na ktorej poprední predstavitelia južného prúdu a spoločnosti gazprom , spoločne s vládnymi partnermi a záujmovými skupinami v sektore , analyzovali spoločenské , environmentálne a ekonomické dopady plynovodu južný prúd .
účastníci si vypočuli informácie o aktuálnom stave výstavby so zvláštnym zameraním na pobrežnú časť v čiernom mori . " od roku 2012 dodala ruská federácia krajinám európskej únie 160 miliónov ton ropy a 125,5 miliardy kubických metrov zemného plynu , " povedal námestník ruského ministra energetiky anatolij janovskij na konferencii .
dodal , že rokovania medzi eú a ruskom zaistia riešenie problémov v súvislosti s tretím energetickým balíkom , ktorý mnohí vnímajú ako prekážku spustenia výstavby . " partnerstvo európskej únie a ruska v oblasti energetiky je mimoriadne významné .
rusko , a najmä spoločnosť gazprom je popredným dodávateľom energie pre taliansko a budúci rok oslávime 40 rokov dodávania energie a obchodných vzťahov medzi spoločnosťami gazprom a eni .
plynovod južný prúd predstavuje dlhodobé riešenie zaisťujúce bezpečné dodávanie energie pre všetkých občanov v európe , vďaka priamemu spojeniu medzi zákazníkmi a najdôležitejšími zásobami plynu na svete , ktoré sa nachádzajú práve v rusku , " povedal námestník ministra . " plyn je environmentálne prijateľný zdroj energie a výstavba plynovodu zaistí povzbudenie európskeho trhu ako celku a poskytne diverzifikáciu energetiky , priláka nové investície do talianska a zároveň podporí tvorbu tisícov nových pracovných miest .
spoločnosti eni a gazprom boli prvými partnermi , ktorí podpísali zakladajúce dohody projektu južný prúd v roku 2007 , " dodal janovskij , prihovárajúc sa prevažne talianskemu publiku.rusko je pre európu najdôležitejším obchodným a energetickým partnerom a vždy predstavovalo istú , stabilnú zásobu plynu pre mnoho európskych krajín .
analytici predpokladajú , že dopyt po zemnom plyne v priebehu najbližších pätnástich rokov narastie z 312 miliárd metrov kubických na 537 miliárd metrov kubických . " zemný plyn v súčasnosti predstavuje najdôležitejší zdroj energie v európskej únii , " objasnil alexander syromyatin , zastupujúci vedúci oddelenia projektového manažmentu spoločnosti gazprom .
" dopyt v blízkej budúcnosti veľmi rýchlo prekoná zásoby z dôvodu klesajúcej ťažobnej kapacity v európe .
projekt južný prúd vyrieši problém tohto deficitu aj do budúcna . " plynovod bude mať dĺžku 2385 km a na jeho výstavbe sa prostredníctvom partnerstva zúčastní 9 krajín vrátane bulharska , srbska , maďarska , talianska a ruska .
vyžiadal si podpis komplexných dohôd medzi vládami partnerských štátov a významnými podnikmi .
celková potrebná investícia bude predstavovať 17 miliárd € , pričom poskytne celkovú ročnú kapacitu 63 miliónov metrov kubických plynu . " ropovod južný prúd dosiahne svoju plnú kapacitu koncom roka 2017 , " povedal oleg aksjutin , člen riadiacej komisie spoločnosti gazprom a generálny riaditeľ spoločnosti south stream transport b.v.
" polovica z tejto kapacity poputuje do talianska .
pobrežná časť plynovodu sa bude z 30 % financovať z partnerstva spoločností gazprom , eni , edf a wintershall a 70 % poskytne trh .
bude zabezpečovať dodávky elektrickej energie pre 38 miliónov domácnosti v európe . " vyhlásenie námestníka ministra janovského zdôraznilo dôležitosť , ktorú rusko pripisuje svojim energetickým partnerstvám s európou , pretože južný prúd nielenže zabezpečí diverzifikáciu a stabilitu zásobovacích trás do eú , ale zároveň aj zníži prepravné riziká.viceprezident európskeho parlamentu gianni pitella povedal : " primárnym cieľom európskeho zákonodarstva musí byť zachovanie prístupu k zásobám energie , najme pre spotrebiteľov a menšie rodinné podniky .
vyžaduje si to záruku efektívnej prevádzky a nízkych nákladov .
tieto ciele dosiahneme len prostredníctvom posilnenia infraštruktúry vnútorného trhu a diverzifikácie energetických zdrojov .
toto je dôvod , pre ktorý projekt južný prúd predstavuje dôležité riešenie situácie súvisiacej s narastajúcim dopytom po zemnom plyne v európe . " názory partnerských krajín projektu južný prúd prezentovali reka szemerkenyiová , poradkyňa maďarského premiéra a dragutin matanovic , poradca srbského premiéra.szemerkenyiová povedala , že prípravy na výstavbu v maďarsku medzičasom výrazne pokročili , no na zosúladenie legislatívy na európskej úrovni je potrebný koordinovaný prístup všetkých účastníckych krajín.povedala : " maďarsko prešlo v oblasti prípravných prác na začatie výstavby južného prúdu dlhú cestu .
všetky technické aspekty fázy pred samotnou výstavbou sú pripravené na začatie prác .
vďaka množstvu odvedenej práce sú stanovené termíny viac ako reálne .
v posledných mesiacoch však všetky medzivládne dohody účastníckych krajín projektu južný prúd museli čeliť kritike európskej únie v súvislosti s tretím energetickým balíkom .
preto musíme s účasťou ruska , eú a účastníckych krajín projektu spolupracovať na zabezpečení pokračovania projektu južný prúd v súlade s plánom . " toto podujatie je po konferenciách v sofii a belehrade tretím v rade podujatí organizovaných publikáciou natural gas europe , popredným nezávislým zdrojom poznatkov týkajúcich sa vývoja európskych trhov so zemným plynom .

failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : f & # 160 ; : \ mathbf ^ \ rightarrow \ mathbf \ , \ ! or failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ mathbf ^ \ , \ ! corresponds to the map from x , y , and the n or ( n-1 ) derivatives of y to the solution , in general implicit .

collection of ode and dae models of physical systems matlab models notes on diffy qs : differential equations for engineers an introductory textbook on differential equations by jiri lebl of uiuc the lorenz attractor arises in the study of the lorenz oscillator , a dynamical system .
the behavior of trajectories as a function of a parameter may be what is needed for an application .
as a parameter is varied , the dynamical systems may have bifurcation points where the qualitative behavior of the dynamical system changes .
for example , it may go from having only periodic motions to apparently erratic behavior , as in the transition to turbulence of a fluid .
a dynamical system is a manifold m called the phase ( or state ) space endowed with a family of smooth evolution functions φt that for any element of t ∈ t , the time , map a point of the phase space back into the phase space .
the notion of smoothness changes with applications and the type of manifold .
there are several choices for the set & # 160 ; t. when t is taken to be the reals , the dynamical system is called a flow ; and if t is restricted to the non-negative reals , then the dynamical system is a semi-flow .
when t is taken to be the integers , it is a cascade or a map ; and the restriction to the non-negative integers is a semi-cascade .
baker 's map is an example of a chaotic piecewise linear map when b = 0 , the eigenvalues of a determine the structure of the phase space .
from the eigenvalues and the eigenvectors of a it is possible to determine if an initial point will converge or diverge to the equilibrium point at the origin. with a a matrix and b a vector .
as in the continuous case , the change of coordinates x & # 160 ; → & # 160 ; x & # 160 ; + & # 160 ; ( 1 & # 160 ; − & # 160 ; a ) & # 160 ; – 1b removes the term b from the equation .
in the new coordinate system , the origin is a fixed point of the map and the solutions are of the linear system a & # 160 ; nx0 .
the solutions for the map are no longer curves , but points that hop in the phase space .
the orbits are organized in curves , or fibers , which are collections of points that map into themselves under the action of the map .
the intersection of the periodic orbit with the poincaré section is a fixed point of the poincaré map f. by a translation , the point can be assumed to be at x & # 160 ; = & # 160 ; 0 .
the taylor series of the map is f ( x ) & # 160 ; = & # 160 ; j & # 160 ; · & # 160 ; x & # 160 ; + & # 160 ; o ( x2 ) , so a change of coordinates h can only be expected to simplify f to its linear part failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : h ^ \ circ f \ circ h ( x ) = j \ cdot x . \ , this is known as the conjugation equation .
finding conditions for this equation to hold has been one of the major tasks of research in dynamical systems .
poincaré first approached it assuming all functions to be analytic and in the process discovered the non-resonant condition .
if λ1 , & # 160 ; ... , & # 160 ; λν are the eigenvalues of j they will be resonant if one eigenvalue is an integer linear combination of two or more of the others .
as terms of the form λi – ∑ ( multiples of other eigenvalues ) occurs in the denominator of the terms for the function h , the non-resonant condition is also known as the small divisor problem .
the results on the existence of a solution to the conjugation equation depend on the eigenvalues of j and the degree of smoothness required from h .
as j does not need to have any special symmetries , its eigenvalues will typically be complex numbers .
when the eigenvalues of j are not in the unit circle , the dynamics near the fixed point x0 of f is called hyperbolic and when the eigenvalues are on the unit circle and complex , the dynamics is called elliptic .
the bifurcations of a hyperbolic fixed point x0 of a system family fμ can be characterized by the eigenvalues of the first derivative of the system dfμ ( x0 ) computed at the bifurcation point .
for a map , the bifurcation will occur when there are eigenvalues of dfμ on the unit circle .
for a flow , it will occur when there are eigenvalues on the imaginary axis .
for more information , see the main article on bifurcation theory .
for systems where the volume is preserved by the flow , poincaré discovered the recurrence theorem : assume the phase space has a finite liouville volume and let f be a phase space volume-preserving map and a a subset of the phase space .
then almost every point of a returns to a infinitely often .
the poincaré recurrence theorem was used by zermelo to object to boltzmann 's derivation of the increase in entropy in a dynamical system of colliding atoms .
a dynamical system is the tuple failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ langle \ mathcal , f , \ mathcal \ rangle , with failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ mathcal the domain for time ( non-negative reals , the integers , ... ) and f an evolution rule t → f t ( with failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : t \ in \ mathcal ) such that f & # 160 ; t is a diffeomorphism of the manifold to itself .
so , f is a mapping of the time-domain failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ mathcal into the space of diffeomorphisms of the manifold to itself .
in other terms , f ( t ) is a diffeomorphism , for every time t in the domain failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ mathcal a dynamical system may be defined formally , as a measure-preserving transformation of a sigma-algebra , the quadruplet ( x , σ , μ , τ ) .
here , x is a set , and σ is a sigma-algebra on x , so that the pair ( x , σ ) is a measurable space. μ is a finite measure on the sigma-algebra , so that the triplet ( x , σ , μ ) is a probability space .
a map τ : x → x is said to be σ-measurable if and only if , for every σ ∈ σ , one has failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ tau ^ \ sigma \ in \ sigma .
a map τ is said to preserve the measure if and only if , for every σ ∈ σ , one has failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ mu ( \ tau ^ \ sigma ) = \ mu ( \ sigma ) .
combining the above , a map τ is said to be a measure-preserving transformation of x , if it is a map from x to itself , it is σ-measurable , and is measure-preserving .
the quadruple ( x , σ , μ , τ ) , for such a τ , is then defined to be a dynamical system .
the map τ embodies the time evolution of the dynamical system .
thus , for discrete dynamical systems the iterates failed to parse ( missing texvc executable ; please see math / readme to configure . ) : \ tau ^ n = \ tau \ circ \ tau \ circ \ ldots \ circ \ tau for integer n are studied .
for continuous dynamical systems , the map τ is understood to be a finite time evolution map and the construction is more complicated .

young africans ugandan import khamis kiiza has vowed to track simba striker khamis tambwe in the race towards golden boot award for the unfolding premiership season .
the yanga striker who scored the only goal against ruvu shootring last saturday at the national stadium in dar es salaam has taken his tally to two after as many appearances .
he is four goals short of tambwe who has been at the top of the scorers ’ list ahead of yesterday ’ s sixth round matches .
tambwe notched his six goals in two matches he featured , one against mbeya city that ended in 2-2 draw and the other versus relegation-haunted mgambo jkt when simba roared to a 6-0 comprehensive rout , the biggest for the season so far .
tambwe has been simba ’ s top marksman at the moment and looks to be on top form as the first half of the season comes towards half way stage this weekend .
